Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
Control flow the client when a connection with the server is established does the following steps: try to register his nickname in order to join the LobbyRegisteredNicknamesMap calling handleNicknameRegistration(nickname, connection)-->if everything is ok now the player can call the handleLobbyJoiningRequest(nickname, connection)-->if everything is ok if the player is not the first one he has to wait until all player join the lobby

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean active
    Boolean that represent that maintains the threadLobby running
    private boolean activeMatch
    Used to inform the lobby if a game that was started is now ended for some reason
    private java.lang.Object activeMatchLock
    Lock used to access safely the content of activeMatch
    private int currentLobbyPlayerCount
    Current number of player that has been chosen by the fist player
    private java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingDeque<Connection> disconnectedPlayers
    List that contains the users that are trying to reconnect to a ongoing game
    private Connection firstConnection
    First connection takes the value of the first user that after calling handleNicknameRegistration calls also the handleJoinLobby method
    private boolean loadGameFromFile
    Boolean that is used to instruct the lobby if it has to create a new game or it has to load it from a file
    private java.lang.Object loadGameLock
    Lock used ta access safely the content of loadGameFromFile variable
    private java.util.LinkedList<Connection> lobbyRequestingConnections
    List that contains a reference to the connection who have already been registered in the registeredNicknamesMap and have called and terminated successfully the handleJoinLobby method
    private LobbyState lobbyState
    Used to control the flow of the lobby and it can been modified both internally and externally
    private static java.util.logging.Logger LOGGER  
    private Match match
    A reference to the current match tha is basically a class with a run method that after doing the setup of the model, controller and view components, waits for new messages from the remoteViews and makes the controller process them
    private static int MAX_PLAYER_PER_GAME  
    private static int MIN_PLAYER_PER_GAME  
    private java.lang.Object playerCountLock
    Lock to access safely the content of currentLobbyPlayerCount
    private java.util.Map<Connection,​java.lang.String> registeredNicknamesMap
    Map that contains a reference to the connection and the name of the players that have called and terminated successfully the method handleNicknameRegistration
    private java.lang.Object resumeGameObject
    Lock used when loading a game from a file
    private Server server
    A reference to the current server
    private static Lobby singleton  
    private java.lang.Object stateLock
    Lock used to access safely the content of lobbyState
    private java.util.List<User> userList
    This list is used when the first player has choose to load the game from a file, and it contains the nicknames of all the players that were in previous game

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Lobby getInstance​(Server server)
      Used by the server to instantiate a lobby
      Parameters:
      server - on witch the lobby is running
      Returns:
      the lobby object

    • setLoadGameFromFile

      private void setLoadGameFromFile​(boolean load)

    • isLoadGameFromFile

      private boolean isLoadGameFromFile()

    • handleResumeGame

      public boolean handleResumeGame​(Connection connection)
      Called instead of setLobbyMaxPlayerCount by the ClientLoadGameMessage when restoring from file. Invokes the aforementioned method passing it the size of the saved game.
      Parameters:
      connection - the player sending the message.
      Returns:
      true if successful.

    • handleNicknameRegistration

      public boolean handleNicknameRegistration​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      Called by the users that are trying to connect to the lobby. Checks that this connection has not already registered with another name and that the chosen nicknames is not already in use by another player
      Parameters:
      nickname - chosen by the user
      connection - connection of the user
      Returns:
      true if successful, otherwise false

    • setLobbyMaxPlayerCount

      public boolean setLobbyMaxPlayerCount​(int playerCount, Connection connection)
      Called by the ClientSetPlayersCountMessage sent by the first player (after they receive the SET_COUNT).
      Parameters:
      playerCount - the number of players expected in the game.
      connection - the player's connection.
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if not.

    • getCurrentLobbyPlayerCount

      public int getCurrentLobbyPlayerCount()

    • handleLobbyJoiningRequest

      public boolean handleLobbyJoiningRequest​(ClientJoinLobbyMessage message, java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      This method handles a request to join the lobby by a player. If nickname and connection are both valid, the method adds the user to the queue, notifies all waiting threads and sends an OK on the connection
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String representing the nickname of the user is communicating
      connection - the Connection from which the user is
      Returns:
      true if there were no errors

    • handleLobbyDisconnection

      public boolean handleLobbyDisconnection​(Connection connection)
      Ths methods handle an explicit disconnection of a player while in the lobby and is called when the client send a DisconnectionMessage
      Parameters:
      connection - requesting disconnection
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • start

      public void start()
      Method called when the lobby is launched on a new thread

    • handleForceLobbyDisconnection

      public boolean handleForceLobbyDisconnection​(Connection connection)
      This method handles the disconnection of a player when is the lobby or match requesting it
      Parameters:
      connection - to disconnect
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • handleGameReconnection

      public boolean handleGameReconnection​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      This method handle the request of reconnection to an ongoing game
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player trying to reconnect
      connection - of the player trying to reconnect
      Returns:
      true if successful

    • waitForDisconnectedPlayers

      private void waitForDisconnectedPlayers()
      This method is called by the lobby after a game is started/loaded successfully and so no setup operation are needed

    • waitForFirstConnection

      private void waitForFirstConnection()
      This method is called by the lobby and sets the tread on witch the lobby is running in wait until the first connection is added to lobbyRequestingConnection

    • waitForCurrentPlayerCount

      private void waitForCurrentPlayerCount()
      Sends the SET_COUNT to the first player that connects, waits for the answer. The client must invoke setLobbyMaxPlayerCount() by sending a ClientSetPlayersCountMessage message to continue.

    • updateMessage

      private void updateMessage()
      Used by the lobby to inform the client about the current number of player inside the lobby

    • getAllParticipants

      private java.util.Map<Connection,​java.lang.String> getAllParticipants()
      Used after the required number of player has joined the lobby and handles the removal of the ConnectionSetupHandler observer from the connection
      Returns:

    • waitForParticipants

      private void waitForParticipants()
      This method wait for connection until we reach the currentLobbyPlayerCount

      This method stops the main ServerLobbyBuilder thread
